name: Anchor Neural World
description: Anchor Neural World is building an ecosystem of decentralized services which revolve primarily around the implementation of artificial intelligence (A.I.) and machine learning (M.L.) based services. To facilitate the governance, accuracy, distribution and capacity of these services, ANW is building a full blockchain ecosystem and integrated wallet for the ANW community and partner companies to participate easily in the usage of its A.I. service cluster. In addition to this, the wallet will include an A.I component within itself to manage digital asset portfolios, and advanced functionality to participate in ANW governance.
